description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (s73) to vary condition 15 (opening hours) of planning application Ref P/2000/1753 dated 23.08.2000 for 'Refurbishment, external alterations and part single / two storey extensions to sports centre. Re-arrangement of external playing fields (cricket field,cricket nets, six 5 aside football pitches and eight tennis courts) with boundary fencing,landscaping and temporary changing rooms and car parking'. Variation seeking to extend opening hours.
